entry.title: ARCTIC OUTFLOW WARNING , Bella Bella
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:03 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Rain, -0.1°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 3.2 km

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with freezing rain and ice pellets changing to rain this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except northeast 70 gusting to 90 through mainland inlets and valleys. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except northeast 60 gusting to 80 through mainland inlets and valleys in the morning. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
